roleset.name: supporting
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, underpin-v.01. No VNcls.

example.name: ADJ, arg1
example.text: Thanx for not posting a long , Bandini-esque screed on the philosophical underpinnings and justification for traffic laws and / or imposed car - free zones .
example.arg: for traffic laws and / or imposed car - free zones
